name: A path to the Duleian Road

stages.logText: I talked to a guard in the east of Fallhaven. He watches over the old passage to the Duleian Road which is now blocked by fallen trees. If I want to help opening the pathway again I should talk to his superior the warden working in the Fallhaven prison.
I talked to the warden. I wasn't able to convince him but he advised me to talk to the woodcutter Jakrar living right south  of Fallhaven's prison.

I talked to Jakrar the woodcutter. He will only cut the trees away if I do him a favor: I should search for his favorite axe east of the Crossroads Guardhouse located in the north of Fallhaven. I should look out for an evil wolf pack.
I have found a wolf pack and slain their leader. Beneath its remains I found Jakrar's axe. I should bring it him back.
Jakrar was very happy to see his good old axe again. He is grateful now and started to cut away the woods immediately.
Now the woodcutter has cut away all the trees which blocked the passage. Yay, finally I've got a nice shortcut to the Duleian Road!
